title: EnrollmentType
description: The data involved in initial creation and maintenance of employee benefit changes.

person.description: Information to identify the person, including name, communication, demographic details and other identifiers.

employeeWorkLifeCycle.description: Information to specify details on the employee life cycle. For example, Hire Date, Leave Expected Return Date, etc.

rateBasedCoverage.description: Information on the rate based coverages of a person.

dependents.description: Information on the dependents of a person.

accountBasedCoverage.description: coverage type for election based coverage - e.g., FSA, Retirement/Savings
